p: To prepare sample solution, aliquots (12.5 Âµg) of EC, CS and F75 EOs were mixed in 1 mL saline solution containing 0.5% v/ v dimethyl sulfoxide (DMSO) [ 16]. The use and percentage of DMSO as co-solvent were according to literature data [ 17]. The same authors reported that intraperitoneal administration of DMSO is well-tolerated by mice up to 10 mL/kg/day dose.
